page.title: 07Needs of the Future Group
page.content:
Medstead School is the secretariat of the Needs of the Future Group, a group of teachers, advisers, lecturers, HMI's, industrialists and others concerned with the problems facing education within the next few years resulting from the impact of micro technology on schools.
We are currently educating children for a future we cannot describe. Our children need to be educated for change, and to be able to cope with the many changes facing society they will meet during their lifetimes.
The group meets several times a year at various educational and industrial venues. Further information from the school.
